Body="<p>John Doe,</p><p><br></p><p>Welcome to Ayehu! We are excited to have you as the newest member of our team. CustomActivity.name: OfficeCreateAccount
CustomActivity.label: OfficeCreateAccount

CustomActivity.name: ZMCreateUsers
CustomActivity.label: ZM Create Users
CustomActivity.description: A Zoom account can have one or more users

CustomActivity.helpHtml: A Zoom account can have one or more users. Use this API to add a new user to your account. **Scopes:** `user:write:admin` `user:write`
